entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
